contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name =Xıllı |settlement_type=Municipality |native_name = |pushpin_map =Azerbaijan |pushpin_mapsize =300 |coordinates_region = AZ |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = {{flag|Azerbaijan}} |subdivision_type1 = [[Administrative divisions of Azerbaijan|Rayon]] |subdivision_name1 =[[Neftchala Rayon|Neftchala]] |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_title = |established_date = |area_total_km2 = |area_footnotes = |population_as_of =2008 |population_total =3941 |population_footnotes =<ref>[http://world-gazetteer.com/wg.php?x=&men=gcis&lng=en&des=wg&geo=-26&srt=npan&col=abcdefghinoq&msz=1500&pt=c&va=x World Gazetteer: Azerbaijan] – World-Gazetteer.com</ref> |population_density_km2 = |timezone =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset = +4 |timezone_DST =[[Azerbaijan Time|AZT]] |utc_offset_DST = +5 |latd=39 |latm=25 |lats=36 |latNS=N |longd=49|longm=06 |longs=23 |longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title |elevation_m = |area_code = |website = }} '''Xıllı''' (also, '''Khilly''' and '''Yukhary-Khylly''') is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in the [[Neftchala Rayon]] of [[Azerbaijan]].{{citation needed|date=October 2010}} It has a population of 3,941. == References == {{Reflist}} *{{GEOnet2|32FA88150A6D3774E0440003BA962ED3}} {{Neftchala Rayon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xilli}} [[Category:Populated places in Neftchala District]] {{Neftchala-geo-stub}}
